name: Pineco
flavorText:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

previous.name: Girafarig
previous.flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

next.name: Forretress
next.flavorText:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.
